name: The Pelican State Railroad
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN!

Louisiana, US, 1920. You are appointed as the head of the state's railways and are tasked to vastly improve it by linking major cities and workplaces throughout the Pelican state. Be careful, as you cannot intersect the railways!

Controls:

While in free cam mode:

WASD - move

L. Shift - fly up

L. Control - fly down

While in build mode:

Mouse - p. much everything

There is a very informative tutorial but it is pretty messy.

Credits:

Music by the youtube audio library

Sound effects by:

https://soundcloud.com/third-octave

http://opengameart.org/users/varkalandar
